EmailTemplate.name: 2019_Tech_Sales_Webinar_Mandates.2019_Tech_Sales_Mandates_Webinar_Thank_You
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending Our Webcast - Mandates Made Easy - Putting Your Aircraft on the Fast Track to Compliance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> THANK YOU FOR ATTENDING! Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}, Thank you for attending our webcast - Mandates Made Easy - Putting Your Aircraft on the Fast Track to Compliance.
Please click HERE <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/recording/share/3rNvOtvxYbqjwTIioOEDcsg1i11PVm1IK1rvmRENlZA?startTime=1553180542000]]> to retrieve your Zoom cloud replay. Due to storage purposes, this Zoom link is only valid for the next two weeks.
Customer Satisfaction Survey: Your feedback is very important to us! This will help us to continually improve our process and your customer experience. Click <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/ZoomWebinarsFeedback]]> to take survey.
Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about the next webinars, events, product launches and more!
YES, KEEP ME IN THE LOOP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>
We look forward to seeing you again.
Thank you,
Honeywell Aerospace
